$1495 / 1br - 550ft² - Corktown Loft - tonnes of light and huge patio SHOWING THIS THURSDAY! (Queen and DVP) (map)

Date: 2012-03-13, 9:01AM EDT
Reply to: gmnwp-2887482430@hous.craigslist.org [Errors when replying to ads?]

About the Building Nestled within Corktown's historic architecture, the Corktown Lofts by Streetcar Developments is one of Toronto's rare LEED certified buildings. High levels of energy efficiency and sustainability are masterfully paired with modern and functional design. Enjoy direct access to the Don Valley Parkway, and the streetcars on Queen street that meet you at your door. Take a short walk to the Distillery District, or better yet, stay at home for the fitness centre, or lounge that is available next door in Phase 2.

About the Unit - available May 1st, 2012 This one bedroom loft features 10' ceilings, exposed duct work, concrete floors, a walk-in closet, lots of storage space, and a massive patio. Not included: parking, locker, hydro.

About the Process Showings are taking place this Thursday March 15th between 6pm and 7pm, please reply to the ad for a time slot. Thanks for your interest.
